title: KIIFB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 17 Technical Assistant Posts
description: Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board (KIIFB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 17 Technical Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the KIIFB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you...
